timeline.bodyText: Also moved this to kork-api.  I think we should migrate all of kork-exceptions to kork-api.  I know we have plugins that pull in kork-exceptions, so all the more reason to get ahead of this and do it soon.
timeline.author: jonsie

timeline.bodyText:
This code was lifted and shifted from ExceptionSummary to this service ExceptionSummaryService.  The main difference here is that we build the user message via the UserMessageService.
This is a breaking change and there will be a corresponding CloudDriver PR.

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps decorateException or something? It's always weird when a method takes the same name as the class that it belongs to. For someone who isn't familiar with the codebase, a call to userMessageService.userMessage(e, "Hello") is going to pretty confusing.

replies.bodyText: Yeah I struggled with the name of this service - wasn't happy with what I settled on.  Gonna have a think on this.

replies.bodyText: Ok, gonna go with ExceptionMessageDecorator#decorate.  That way that arguments passed to decorate are more self explanatory.
